moves.1. e4 d5 2. exd5 Qxd5 3. Nc3 Qd8 4. Bc4:
Bad move !
d5 has four attacks and just one defense.
moves.13... Bxd5 14. Nxd5 c6: Here, instead of cutting d5, I thought of advancing c7 and attacking d5.
moves.15. Nxf6+ Bxf6 16. Rc1: Bad move again ! b2 in danger.
moves.16... Bxb2 17. Bxh7+ Kxh7 18. Qd2 Qc7 19: Another move inviting Bishop to remove the defenses of the White king! May be risky both ways !
moves.34. Re5 Qg6 35. Ng5 Qb1+ 36. Kf2: White King is coming out ! Be careful.
Not good ! Leaving the Knight bit alone.
moves.42... Kg8 43. Re7 Qc4+: Both White King and the Knight got attacked.
moves.47. Kg6: Very crucial move ! This leads to a disaster.
